ef:agent.ef:name: The EnginFrame LDAP User Group services

ef:service.ef:name: Add LDAP User
ef:service.ef:action: if [[ ${#password} -lt 8 ]]; then output="The new password must have at least 8 characters" >&2 elif [[ ! ${password} =~ [[:upper:]]+ ]]; then output="The new password must contain at least one uppercase character" >&2 elif [[ ! ${password} =~ [[:lower:]]+ ]]; then output="The new password must contain at least one lowercase character" >&2 elif [[ ! ${password} =~ [[:digit:]]+ ]]; then output="The new password must contain at least one digit" >&2 elif [[ ${password} != ${re_password} ]]; then output="Passwords do not match" >&2 else output=$(sudo /usr/sbin/add.ldap.user.sh "${userName}" "${password}") if [[ $? -eq 0 ]]; then output="success" fi fi echo "${output}"

ef:service.ef:name: Delete LDAP User
ef:service.ef:action: for userName in $userNames do sudo /usr/sbin/remove.ldap.user.sh $userName >/dev/null 2>&1 done
